name: Mockup UI
description: A Layout based on Reddit user Nintenbits' design (https://www.reddit.com/r/NintendoSwitch/comments/5luxp3/mockup_nintendo_switch_home_screen_ui/). Use the background template from here: https://github.com/ThemezerNX/Layouts/tree/master/ResidentMenu/Mockup%20UI/resources
